# 本工具用于生成nnunetv2训练的数据集

## 数据准备要求

格式如下，其中rtstructure中的rtdose或rtplan不影响数据处理

```shell
D:.
├─yang xiu min^YXM^^^ 0001670274
│  │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63844815147775321000001.5191493344865160531.dcm
│  │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63844815147862553100001.5008607662014875049.dcm
│  │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63844815147944771600001.5053759988612551835.dcm
│  │
│  └─2026-05-28 20240528
│          RS1.3.6.1.4.1.2452.6.643115217.1228448639.4116772226.3824098783.dcm
│
├─yin xiao xiao^YXX^^^ 0001691195
│  │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63852401430994659500001.4830072649970074944.dcm
│  │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63852401431078881200001.4857463926608781374.dcm
│  │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63852401431163105500001.5585074904336630293.dcm
│  │
│  └─2024-06-17 20240617
│          RS1.3.6.1.4.1.2452.6.2043666949.1187960226.2670776201.823987941.dcm
│
└─yu gui zhi^YGZ^^^ 0001687292
    │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63853619784198298500001.5040893312600824711.dcm
    │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63853619784289541400001.5176622265190405526.dcm
    │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63853619784373765700001.5202075693418809906.dcm
    │  CT1.3.46.670589.33.1.63853619784454981200001.4736671542801572868.dcm
    │
    └─2024-06-17 20240617
            RS1.3.6.1.4.1.2452.6.1151970768.1195226202.2257677726.874022248.dcm
```

## 操作说明

- 拖动或选择文件夹，点击处理（去除确实RTStructure文件的数据，保留多个日期计划中最新数据），右侧列出所有存在的roi标签







## 打包

```
# 创建虚拟环境
coda create -n toolbox python=3.9
# 激活环境
conda activate toolbox
# 安装依赖
cd /d 项目目录
pip install -r requirements.txt
# 打包工具
python -m PyInstaller -F --window main.py

```
